div.h2: Indicator of Hypersensitivity or Intolerance to Substance
div.p: The Indicator of Hypersensitivity or Intolerance to Substance value set includes values that may be used to indicate or state a propensity to adverse reaction to a substance. The values represent a range of concept types such as substances, medicines, clinical findings and negated allergy findings.

title.value: Indicator of Hypersensitivity or Intolerance to Substance

description.value: The Indicator of Hypersensitivity or Intolerance to Substance value set includes values that may be used to indicate or state a propensity to adverse reaction to a substance. The values represent a range of concept types such as substances, medicines, clinical findings and negated allergy findings.
